title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9003.40 - Dumping, excavations and landfill
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9003.40 - Dumping, excavations and landfill

State Regulations

No person shall perform, cause, suffer or allow to be
performed any dumping, excavations or landfill operations on, within or
adjacent to any park property without a permit. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
9003.40

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
